first_name.description: The first name of the addressee
first_name.title: First Name

last_name.description: The last name of the addressee
last_name.title: Last Name

address_line1.description: The house number and street name
address_line1.title: Address Line1

address_line2.description: The suite, post office box, or apartment number (optional)
address_line2.title: Address Line2

zip_code.description: The zip code of the address
zip_code.title: Zip Code

state.description: The USPS abbreviation for the state of the address (e.g. AK)
state.title: State

country.description: The ISO abbreviation for the country of the address (e.g. US). A list of all available two-letter country codes can be found here.
country.title: Country

phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the address
phone_number.title: Phone Number

instructions.description: Optional instructions to include with the shipping addresses
instructions.title: Instructions

name_on_card.description: The full name on the credit/debit card
name_on_card.title: Name On Card

security_code.description: The card verification value on the back of the credit/debit card
security_code.title: Security Code

expiration_month.description: The month of the expiration of the card (e.g. January is 1, February is 2)
expiration_month.title: Expiration Month

expiration_year.description: The year of the expiration of the card (e.g. 2016)
expiration_year.title: Expiration Year

use_gift.description: Whether or not to use the gift balance on the retailer account. If true, then the gift balance will be used for payment. Only works for retailers which support gift balance (Amazon and Walmart).
use_gift.title: Use Gift

use_account_payment_defaults.description: Overrides all other payment_method options and uses the default payment configuration on the account. Only applies to Amazon orders.
use_account_payment_defaults.title: Use Account Payment Defaults

is_virtual_card.description: Whether or not to check the 'Virtual or one-time-use' checkbox when adding the card. Only applies to Amazon orders.
is_virtual_card.title: Is Virtual Card

reuse.description: If true, will skip entering credit card if it is already present and we aren't prompted for it. Only applies to Amazon orders.
reuse.title: Reuse

email.description: The email for the retailer account
email.title: Email

password.description: The password for the retailer account
password.title: Password

verification_code.description: (Optional) The verification code required by the retailer for logging in. Only required in cases where the retailer prevents a login with an account_locked_verification_required error code.
verification_code.title: Verification Code

totp_2fa_key.description: (Optional) The secret key used for two factor authentication. If you have two factor authentication enabled, you must provide this key. You can find the 64 digit Amazon key by enabling two factor authentication and clicking on the 'Can't scan the barcode?' link. Note: This is not the 6 digit time based code.
totp_2fa_key.title: Totp 2Fa Key

order_by.description: The ordering of available shipping methods that meet the desired criteria. Available values are price or speed. If ordering by price, then the Zinc API will choose the cheapest shipping method that meets the desired criteria, while speed will choose the fastest shipping method meeting the criteria.
order_by.title: Order By

max_days.description: The maximum number of days allowed for shipping on the order.
max_days.title: Max Days

max_price.description: The maximum price in cents allowed for the shipping cost of the order.
max_price.title: Max Price

retailer.description: The retailer code of the supported retailer
retailer.title: Retailer

products.description: A list of product objects that should be ordered
products.title: Products

shipping_address.description: An address object to which the order will be delivered

shipping_method.description: The desired shipping method for the object. Available methods are cheapest, fastest, amazon_day, or free. You must provide either this or the shipping attribute, but not both.
shipping_method.title: Shipping Method

shipping.description: A shipping object with information as to which shipping method to use. You must provide either this or the shipping_method attribute, but not both.

billing_address.description: An address object for the person associated with the credit card

payment_method.description: A payment method object containing payment information for the order

retailer_credentials.description: A retailer credentials object for logging into the retailer with a preexisting account

is_gift.description: Whether or not this order should be placed as a gift. Typically, retailers will exclude the price of the items on the receipt if this is set.
is_gift.title: Is Gift

max_price.description: The maximum price in cents for the order. If the final price exceeds this number, the order will not go through and will return a max_price_exceeded error.
max_price.title: Max Price
